column1: another! this Court held  as  follows:

"the  Petition er  who  is seeking  relief  in  an  applic ation  for  the 
issue  of  a
writ of certiorari  is not entitled  to  relief as  a matter of course,  as  a matter

of  right  or as  a matter of routine.  Even 
if he  is entitled  to  relief,  still  the
delay,  laches,  waiver,  submission  to  jurisdiction are  all  valid  impediments
which  stand against the grant of relief."
